job.title: Machine Learning Engineer-Photos
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtDo you have a passion for building the best photo library in the worldltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtiPhone is the most popular camera in the world Detailed integration of software and hardware has delivered magical experiences like Photos Memories and Portrait Mode The Camera ampamp Photos team creates privacyrespecting machine learning technologies to ship emotional experiences to hundreds of millions of users worldwideltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking for an outstanding machine learning engineer to develop stateoftheart algorithms and infrastructure for the next generation of thoughtful and personal products we deliver If you thrive at the intersection of algorithms applied machine learning and graphs this position will excite and inspire youltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtDemonstrated expertise machine learning related to graphs or rankingrecommendation systemsltbrgtltbrgtExceptional problemsolving and interpersonal skillsltbrgtltbrgtKnowledge of data structures algorithms and objectoriented programmingltbrgtltbrgtGood programming skills in PythonltbrgtltbrgtHandson experience working with deep learning toolkits such as Tensorflow PyTorch or KerasltbrgtltbrgtProven experience or education in linear algebra statistics graph theory Bayesian statistics desirableltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtIn this role you will ideate prototype and develop new ways of using knowledge graphs to power machine learning algorithms for a suite of learning problems including clustering ranking and classificationltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtCandidates should have a proven track record that demonstrates academic aptitude strong collaboration excellent communication skills and a passion for designing high quality algorithms with the user experience in focusltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThe candidate needs to show initiative take ownership of a problem and work crossfunctionally to collect information solve problems and disseminate findingsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtMS  PhD in Computer Science or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtAdditional Requirementsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtPerforming quality assurance and testing of the developed routines and applicationsltbrgtltbrgtPrototyping designing developing and shipping new personalized experiencesltbrgtltbrgtWorking multifunctionally to connect knowledge across the platform and create intelligent customerfacing featuresltbrgtltbrgt
